channel.title: The science of questions... (and how this board works)
channel.description:
I adopted a board on an old forum of mine very similar to this. A few people have asked me to bring it back and I figured it would be a nice addition to MoparScape.
The logistics of this board are straightforward. If you have some complex or puzzling concept in physics, chemistry, philosophy, or anything you can fit "theory" into, post it here. Beware that we have high expectations for the types of posts in this board, so be sure you at least make some effort to be intelligible if you want to participate in discussion.
Any questions about this board can be messaged to me or posted as replies to this sticky. Thanks. :)

item.title: The science of questions... (and how this board works)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I may come off serious but I post because it’s fun and a great way to pass the time

but go ahead, post a few thought provoking threads and provided they don’t get overrun by idiots you’ll get some decent discussions going

Read full topic
item.source: The science of questions... (and how this board works)

item.title: The science of questions... (and how this board works)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

so how about posting some intellectual threads instead of asking mods to fix a problem that quite frankly is a non-issue

Read full topic

item.title: The science of questions... (and how this board works)
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

Hmmm. Am I actually allowed to geek out here and be a total nerd?! Without being to go away

Read full topic
item.source: The science of questions... (and how this board works)

item.title: The science of questions... (and how this board works)
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Stupit:

Just confirming this, we are allowed to chat about religion, just no ‘LOL RELIGION GAY’ kind of shit?

As long as it’s kept at an intellectual and not emotional level. I wouldn’t hold off on religions after mentioning the Higgs boson in the description of the board.

Read full topic

item.title: The science of questions... (and how this board works)
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Team_Rocket:

How about debating menial things? Such as Pizza Hut V.S. Domino’s? Things might get complex if someone brings up chicken wings.

Cute, but that’s evidently not what this board is intended for. I’ll post a few things tomorrow to try and get it started, if no one else does.

Read full topic
